name:
I actually greatly prefer it without Kimball. He always bothered me, and was ironically picky for the host of a cooking show (didn't like spicy food, was overtly preferential to New England culinary traditions, etc.). I also found him sort of irritating :)

Give me Bridget and Julia any day!
